tasks.label: docker compose up gmeet_bot
tasks.command: docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.local.gmeet.yml up --build -d && sleep 2

tasks.label: docker compose down gmeet_bot
tasks.command: docker compose down && docker image prune -f
